original_text: So they hired thirty and two thousand chariots, and the king of Maachah and his people; who came and pitched before Medeba. And the children of Ammon gathered themselves together from their cities, and came to battle.
korean_text: 곧 병거 삼만 이천 대와 마아가 왕과 그의 군대를 고용하였더니 그들이 와서 메드바 앞에 진 치매 암몬 자손이 그 모든 성읍으로부터 모여 와서 싸우려 한지라

sentences.original_text: So they hired thirty and two thousand chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이만 이천 대의 전차를 고용하였고

sentences.original_text: and the king of Maachah and his people
who came and pitched before Medeba
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 와서 메데바 앞에 진을 쳤더라

sentences.original_text: And the children of Ammon gathered themselves together
